Title: Relates to dispositional alternatives for children placed with local social services agencies as destitute minors
Summary: Allows the court to enter an order regarding a destitute minor freeing the child for adoption and granting guardianship and custody to the commissioner of social services for the purposes of consenting to an adoption; authorizes certain commissioners of public welfare and city public welfare officers to consent to such adoptions.
LawCode: Amd ยง1095, Fam Ct Act; amd ยง398, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act and the social services law, in relation to dispositional alternatives for children placed with local social services agencies as destitute minors
